workflows.creator: 5fded9ad-cf9a-43e3-9b08-28bde8b87d6e
workflows.title: Create Jira ticket for a Flow Error

boolean-condition-2.title: Exceeds max length?
boolean-condition-2.description: If the description of the issue exceeds the max length, adds the instance description as a comment instead of updating the ticket description.

jira-cloud-3.title: Create Defect Issue in TSI
jira-cloud-3.description:
* customfield_10140 - it is a Product custom field that consist of two sub-fields. {"id": 10639,"child": {"id": 11339} } - means "WS Lambda: Trilogy Sales Infrastructure" product and "Sales Automation" project.

*customfield_10010 - is a "Request Type" custom field, and 133 means "Fix a Bug".

jira-cloud-1.title: Search Existing Issue
jira-cloud-1.description:
* customfield_10140 - it is a Product custom field that consist of two sub-fields. {"id": 10639,"child": {"id": 11339} } - means "WS Lambda: Trilogy Sales Infrastructure" product and "Sales Automation" project.

*customfield_10010 - is a "Request Type" custom field, and 133 means "Fix a Bug".

jira-cloud-4.title: Create comment for instance
jira-cloud-4.description: Adds the instance description as a comment to the existing issue.

script-2.title: Build updated description
script-2.description: Builds the updated description for the issue by considering the new issue instance.
